review: This thing is amazing. Can watch almost anything I can think of. Only had it for a few days now and didn't know what I was missing. Works seamlessly with Amazon Prime and Amazon Cloud. Can watch many other Non-Amazon products too. No reason to boot-up the computer any more to access YouTube. Glad I purchased it.
author: Walt O.

review: excellent...for the cost i cant expect any better product. I am very impressed with mirroring feature. I can mirror my S4 easily and run any app on my tv and browse too.I am sure with future software updates it going to become better and better
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love this item!  I purchased it at a Staples location for $24.99 (pre-tax) and I was immediately hooked on it.  I don't have a smart tv so this was a perfect, low cost addition to get apps like hulu and netflix without having to rely on a laptop and a VGA cable....
author: Cheryl D

review: Does not work. Get message "cannot locate amazon.com" and then a suggestion to check my router. However, there is nothing wrong with the Wi-Fi network all other devices work fine.

review: In general I'm impressed with the device. It streams easily for services I already have on other devices,  and makes using prime video and other apps easy. Plus the voice remote cell phone app is a nice touch. Screen mirror can be done from the settings screen for droid devices, not sure they mentioned that in the product details. There's also a few free apps, like crackle, and classic tv.
